禬字的基本解释

禬
guì
古代为消灾除病而举行的祭祀：“掌以时招梗禬禳之事，以除疾殃。”
古代诸侯会聚财物接济盟国：“以禬礼哀围败。”
古代诸侯接济盟国的财物：“致禬以补诸侯之灾。”

禬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guì］
［《廣韻》古外切，去泰，見。］
［《廣韻》黄外切，去泰，匣。］
(1)古指消除灾病。也指为消除灾病而举行的祭祀。
(2)古指聚合财物接济他人之礼。参见“禬禮”。

禬字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　禬； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页847第04
【唐韻】【正韻】?古外切，音膾。除殃祭也。【周禮·天官】女祝掌以時招梗禬禳之事也。【註】除災害曰禬，禬猶刮去也。卻變異曰禳。禳，攘也。　又【周禮·春官·大宗伯】以禬禮哀圍敗。【註】同盟者會合財貨，以更其所喪。　又【說文】會福祭也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?黃外切，音會。義?同。

禬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
禬字的起名意思

本意指衣服上会合交结之处，也指古代为消灾除病而举行的祭祀。

Hu
Basic explanation of words
Hu
guì
A sacrificial ceremony held in ancient times for the purpose of eliminating disasters and diseases: "The palm of the hand is used to move the stubbornness of the scorpion, to eliminate the disease."
The ancient princes gathered their wealth to help the allied countries: "Were besieged by mourning."
The ancient princes received the property of the allied countries: "to make up for the disasters of the princes."
Hu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guì］
["Guangyun" ancient outside cut, go to Thailand, see you. ]
["Guangyun" Huang cut outside, go to Thailand, Xie. ]
(1) Ancient refers to the elimination of disasters. It also refers to the sacrifices held to eliminate disasters.
(2) Ancient refers to the gift of gathering property to help others. See "Rui Li".
Hu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Department of Showing Characters] 　禬; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 847 04
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Ancient outside cut, sound 脍. In addition to sacrifices also. [Zhou Li·Tianguan] The female Zhuzhang is also a matter of intrigue. [Note] In addition to disasters, it is called 禬, and 禬 is still scraped off. But the variation is called 禳.禳, humiliation also.　[Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Da Zong Bo] besieged and defeated with mourning. [Note] Allies will gather wealth to make more losses.　[Said Wen] Huifu also offers sacrifices.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Huang Waiqie, Yinhui. Righteous? Same.

Name meaning
The original meaning refers to the meeting place on the clothes, and it also refers to the ancient sacrificial rites held to eliminate disasters and diseases.
guì
I сущ.
* pum. моление об избавлении от бед

* собирать средства (в помощь бедствующим, напр. разбитому союзнику)
